word_mean: 家谱，谱系，家系：列出个体祖辈的图和表，在人类遗传学上，用于遗传分析
又称“家谱”。一个家族各世代成员数目、亲缘关系、特定基因和遗传标记在该家族内的传递、表达和分布的记载。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French péde grue 'crane's foot', a mark used to denote succession in pedigrees

entry.tran: （狗、猫等动物的）血统记录，纯种谱系
entry.def: If a dog, cat, or other animal has a pedigree, its ancestors are known and recorded. An animal is considered to have a good pedigree when all its known ancestors are of the same type.

example.ex: 60 per cent of dogs and ten per cent of cats have pedigrees.

entry.tran: 有纯种谱系证明的；纯种的
entry.def: A pedigree animal is descended from animals which have all been of a particular type, and is therefore considered to be of good quality.
Someone's pedigree is their background or their ancestors.

example.ex: Hammer's business pedigree almost guaranteed him the acquaintance of U.S. presidents...
example.tran: 哈默的商业背景几乎保证了他能够结识美国总统。

example.ex: She had an impeccable aristocratic pedigree.

means.word_mean: 2. line of descent of a pure-bred animal
1. having a list of ancestors as proof of being a purebred animal

sentences.en: The champions really showed their pedigree today.

sentences.en: These trees have pedigrees stretching back thousands of years.
sentences.cn: 这些树的系谱可以追溯到数千年前。

sentences.en: A pedigree pup should have been inoculated against serious diseases before it’s sold.
sentences.cn: 纯种狗应该在出售前注射预防严重疾病的针。
